name: Dal Tadka
description: Yellow lentils tempered with ghee, garlic, and spices. Served with rice or roti.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Creamy tomato-based curry with tender pieces of grilled chicken.

name: Veg Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with vegetables and traditional spices.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Paneer cubes cooked in creamy spinach gravy, flavored with mild Indian spices.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried fluffy bhature bread.

name: Matar Paneer
description: Soft paneer cubes and green peas simmered in a rich onion-tomato gravy.

name: Fish Curry
description: Tangy coconut-based fish curry with traditional coastal spices.

name: Jeera Rice
description: Fragrant basmati rice tempered with cumin seeds. Best paired with curries.
